stories.title: The physicist who built her career on clay
Help Wanted: Adjunct Professor, Must Have Doctorate. Salary: $0

stories.text: Are there any reasons not to defund the intelligence community? If so, what?  It appears its members could just get other jobs, while this would increase freedom without any downsides.  Are there any benefits to having an intelligence community, and if so what?
stories.title: Ask HN: Is there any reason not to defund the intelligence community?

stories.text:
I'm currently trying to find the best video editing tool for implementation and I've been lost with all the tools out there so I was wondering if anyone had first-hand experience on one and can recommend (specifically in react)

my use case is this: A Regular media player (stop, play, speed, change resolution, w.e) with the abilities to:

* play specific parts of the video using JS * highlight specific parts * changing said highlighted parts * not an iframe * minimized display * progress bar with mini-frame display * (optional) adding overlays
stories.title: Ask HN: Best Video editing tool library for web development?
Consistent AI Video Content Editing with Text-Guided Input
Free Ways to Practice Sign Language Online
WatchGuard failed to explicitly disclose critical flaw exploited by hackers

stories.text:
Right now, I have 20+ tabs with HN links and threads that I wanted to catch up "someday". It's fascinating to me how folks keep engaging in long discussions here while having a job! .. Not completely serious on that, but that's the bottom line really. Maybe you're only interested in one or two topic each day?

For me the UI is a bottleneck too (notifications plz?) but I don't think that is a major player here.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you keep up with HN?
